name: Timed Control
description:
Submission for GMTK - Game Jam 2020 (Theme: "Out of Control")

In this game, whenever you move, shoot or do any action. It uses up 'Control Time". Control Time is what allows you to move. If you use up all of it. You won't be able to move until it charges all the way back up. Enemies have a chance to drop an "Upgrade Card", where you choose between 2 of 3 upgrades on which one you want.

*Had to cut project kinda short  of what was planned due to time*
